item.title: My Year 2k16
item.description: “A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.” – Lao Tzu There is a tradition in Japan since 1995: Every year, one character will be chosen as kanji of the year at Kiyomizu Temple, which represents the events of the entire year. So I choose the character of my year 2016 is Shi It means: to start, beginning. Begin to connect 01 Jan 2016: A new habit Actually it’s easy for me to build this habit.
